thread.section_title: Inkfarm.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Inkfarm.com | www.inkfarm.com | 24 of 819
thread.title: Rebecca

author: Rebecca
title: Rebecca
text:
When I didn't get my order by two weeks, I called and was put on hold for over 20 minutes. When I finally got someone to talk to I was told my order came back because the zip code was incomplete. Now who's fault is that! They sent \he order out again and I finally got it about 6 days later.
This delay in service held up my being able to copy out my W-2's to send to my accountant. Lousy service.
